message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $15,000. Considering its high quality and the benefits it offers, I believe it's an excellent investment for you. To make this opportunity more appealing, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this proposal carefully. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.
